header.rec_loc: A car journey from Manchester to Cornwall (going on holiday)
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: English language (school subject), university and courses, philosophy, service stations, directions, plans for later, counties and spellings and pronunciation, English language (general and change), spelling, etymology/ words, lightning and storms, organ donations, squeamishness, quinoa, bike race, farmerâ€™s market, pigs.
header.activity: Father and daughter converse on journey to Cornwall (summer holiday)
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, anecdote telling making arrangements
